items.sentence: There\'s a good chance that Tom will be here this afternoon.
Tom couldn\'t produce any evidence to back his statement up.
Tom didn\'t even write one letter to Mary while he was away.
Don\'t make me angry. You wouldn\'t like me when I\'m angry.
Tom has asked me to meet him at his office tomorrow at 2:30.
Tom has offered to take care of the children this afternoon.
Tom hopes that Mary will like the present he bought for her.
You can\'t go yet because you still have a few things to do.
You don\'t know how bad I want to learn how to speak French.
You don\'t need to be a rocket scientist to figure that out.
You have to get up early tomorrow. Why don\'t you go to bed?
Tom didn\'t even have the decency to admit it was his fault.
Let\'s not argue about that now. We\'ve got bigger problems.
The next song I\'m going to sing was written by Tom Jackson.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t know how to speak French.
I can\'t count the number of times I\'ve heard Tom say that.
Tom couldn\'t understand why no one else seemed to be happy.
Clearly, both drivers weren\'t paying attention to the road.
Tom and I used to hang out together when we were in college.
Tom and Mary agreed not to talk to their children in French.
Tom and Mary are sitting on the porch talking to each other.
There are a lot of things I need to do before I can go home.
There are lots of things we could do to help those families.
Tom ended up not buying the car he was looking at last week.
Tom finally convinced Mary to bake a birthday cake for John.
Tom gave Mary a calendar and she put it on her refrigerator.
Tom fell asleep while he was driving and caused an accident.
Tom found what he was looking for in the back of the closet.
Tom frequently waits until the last minute to pay his bills.
Why does this kind of thing always happen when I\'m on duty?
I have a feeling that something dreadful is going to happen.
I want to apologize for all the things I said earlier today.
Tom looked in the fridge to see what he could find to drink.
Tom seemed like he was about to burst into tears any minute.
You have to be very talented to do that the way Tom does it.
I know that I\'m supposed to enjoy this class, but I don\'t.
Tom thought Mary knew what time she was supposed to show up.
Tom told Mary that he was the captain of the wrestling team.
Tom hid the knife he\'d killed Mary with in John\'s bedroom.
The play was a lot of fun. I wish you could have been there.
The police think Tom was stabbed before his throat was slit.
Tom didn\'t get along well with the other boys in his class.
Tom doesn\'t earn enough money to support a woman like Mary.
If Tom finds out that I told you this, he\'ll be very angry.
If there\'s anyone here who disagrees with me, speak up now.
I want to hear the whole story, and don\'t skip any details.
Tom is a bad driver, but he thinks that he\'s a good driver.
Tom is one of the world\'s leading experts on cybersecurity.
I promise you I\'ll stay with you until your father arrives.
Tom dumped Mary\'s body into the hole he had dug previously.
